content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

ALTER PROC [dbo].[UpsertDimWorkflow] AS
BEGIN

UPDATE W SET 
 W.Workflowcode	= lw.Workflowcode
,W.Workflowname	= lw.Workflowname
,W.Description 	= lw.Description 
,W.Dataobjectid	= lw.Dataobjectid
,W.Statusid		= lw.Statusid
from
[dbo].[DimWorkflow] W
JOIN
Load.Workflow lW ON
W.Workflowid = LW.Workflowid

insert into [dbo].[DimWorkflow] (Workflowid	,Workflowcode	,Workflowname	,Description 	,Dataobjectid	,Statusid)
SELECT Workflowid	,Workflowcode	,Workflowname	
,Description 	,Dataobjectid	,Statusid
FROM
Load.Workflow lw
LEFT JOIN 
[dbo].[DimWorkflow] W ON LW.Workflowid = w.Workflowid
WHERE W.Workflowid IS NULL


--Insert the log details into Load.LogDetails table
DECLARE @logId INT
SELECT @logId = LogID FROM [Load].[Log] WHERE FileType = 'Workflow' 

INSERT INTO [Load].[LogDetails] (LogId,CompletedDate)
select @logId,  GETDATE()

--update load.Log table
UPDATE [Load].[Log] SET LastUpdatedDate = GETDATE() WHERE FileType = 'Workflow' 


END
GO
